<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/vcc/{region}/chat/v2/tenant/{tenant-id}/web-hooks"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new customer webhook.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"region","in":"path","description":"Business region to use [e.g., us, eu, ca, ap]","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["us","eu","ca","ap"],"example":"us","default":"us"}},{"name":"tenant-id","in":"path","description":"Tenant ID.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"string"},"example":"TheTenant"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["name","notificationVersion","uri"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","format":"string","maxLength":256},"uri":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"The client URI used to send system events and messages."}}},{"type":"object","properties":{"version":{"type":"string","enum":["v1.0","v2.0"],"description":"Event API version.","default":"v2.0","title":"EventVersion"}},"title":"EventVersionIdentifierField"}],"title":"WebHookV2CreateRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
